START.name: Entry Cloud of Heaven
START.desc: Here's a key that will take you to any of the seven clouds of Heaven.

ONE.name: Cloud of Virtue
ONE.desc: You see a table that goes as far as the eye can see. A feast! With every type of food imaginable. Your loved ones that have passed are all seated next to an empty wooden chair, with your name engraved in the back.

TWO.name: Cloud of Generosity
TWO.desc: Everything you ever wanted but were never able to get lies before you.

THREE.name: Cloud of Righteousness
THREE.desc: Angels playing the harp are found throughout this dream spa. The view is like nothing you've ever seen. There's massage tables, mud baths, steam rooms, etc. There is even a section just for you, filled with everything you found most relaxing on Earth.

FOUR.name: Cloud of Life
FOUR.desc: In the blink of an eye you see every living thing that has ever existed. From plants to animals, even the extinct ones! It's oddly peaceful. On Earth if a cheetah was next to a penguin it would most likely attempt to eat it for dinner. Here, everything is peaceful and friendly, especially to you. You're even able to hear what each animal is thinking if you concentrate.

FIVE.name: Cloud of Glory
FIVE.desc: All your loved ones who have passed are here to greet you, including your old pets. From here you can look through magical windows to check up on those still alive on Earth.

SIX.name: Cloud of Integrity
SIX.desc: God's angels rest here. If you feel as though your work on Earth isn't finished yet you may train to become a Guardian Angel.

SEVEN.name: Cloud of God
SEVEN.desc: God resides here. Guardian Angels are often flying in and out to receive missions.
